entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Richer

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 20. POP 30%

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
